A SPV water pumping system consists of a photovoltaic array mounted on a stand, and one of the following motor-pump sets compatible with the photovoltaic array:
\n1.surface mounted centrifugal pump set,
\n2.submersible pump set,
\n3.floating pump set,
\n4.Submersible pump set,
\n5.Any other type of motor-pump set, after approval from MNES.
\nThe photovoltaic array converts the solar energy into electricity, which is used for running the motor pump set. The pumping system draws water from the open well, bore well, stream, pond, canal etc.
